Doctors and nurses must urgently be deployed to fight coronavirus in care homes, care bosses have said, as the largest operators announced sharp rises in their death tolls.

articles.description: Ten new coronavirus cases were confirmed in Gwynedd, according to the latest public health data.
articles.content:
Ten new coronavirus cases were confirmed in Gwynedd, according to the latest public health data.
Figures released by Public Health Wales reveal that as of 1pm on April 19, there were 10 new confirmed cases in Gwynedd, and no new cases in Anglesey.
